config.random_mode.name: Enable Random Mode
config.random_mode.desc: If enabled, the sunset time will change dynamically.
config.frequency.name: Frequency
config.frequency.desc: How often the sunset time changes.
config.min_time.name: Earliest Sunset
config.min_time.desc: The earliest time the sun can start setting (Format: 1600 = 4pm).
config.max_time.name: Latest Sunset
config.max_time.desc: The latest time the sun can start setting (Format: 2000 = 8pm).
config.manual_spring.name: Spring Time
config.manual_spring.desc: Fixed sunset time for Spring (Only used if Random Mode is OFF).
config.manual_summer.name: Summer Time
config.manual_summer.desc: Fixed sunset time for Summer (Only used if Random Mode is OFF).
config.manual_fall.name: Fall Time
config.manual_fall.desc: Fixed sunset time for Fall (Only used if Random Mode is OFF).
config.manual_winter.name: Winter Time
config.manual_winter.desc: Fixed sunset time for Winter (Only used if Random Mode is OFF).
